typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		fecha_hoy_casos as string,
		Caso as string,
		{Fecha Not} as string,
		Departamento as string,
		Departamento_nom as string,
		Ciudad_municipio as string,
		Ciudad_municipio_nom as string,
		Edad as string,
		unidad_medida as string,
		Sexo as string,
		Fuente_tipo_contagio as string,
		Ubicacion as string,
		Estado as string,
		Pais_viajo_1_cod as string,
		Pais_viajo_1_nom as string,
		Recuperado as string,
		Fecha_inicio_sintomas as string,
		Fecha_muerte as string,
		Fecha_diagnostico as string,
		Fecha_recuperado as string,
		Tipo_recuperacion as string,
		per_etn_ as string,
		nom_grupo_ as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> leemuestradatos
leemuestradatos derive(Departamento = case(Departamento=="11", "25", 
     Departamento=="47001", "47",
     Departamento=="8001", "8",
     Departamento=="13001", "13",
     Departamento),
		Departamento_nom = case(Departamento_nom=="BOGOTA", "CUNDINAMARCA",
     Departamento_nom=="STA MARTA D.E.", "MAGDALENA",
     Departamento_nom=="BARRANQUILLA", "ATLANTICO",
     Departamento_nom=="CARTAGENA", "BOLIVAR",
     Departamento_nom)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(input(
		fecha_hoy_casos as string,
		Caso as string,
		{Fecha Not} as string,
		Departamento as string,
		Departamento_nom as string,
		Ciudad_municipio as string,
		Ciudad_municipio_nom as string,
		Edad as string,
		unidad_medida as string,
		Sexo as string,
		Fuente_tipo_contagio as string,
		Ubicacion as string,
		Estado as string,
		Pais_viajo_1_cod as string,
		Pais_viajo_1_nom as string,
		Recuperado as string,
		Fecha_inicio_sintomas as string,
		Fecha_muerte as string,
		Fecha_diagnostico as string,
		Fecha_recuperado as string,
		Tipo_recuperacion as string,
		per_etn_ as string,
		nom_grupo_ as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['muestra_datos_ds_salida'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> receptor1
